name: Quests N Creatures | Teal Version
description:
Quests & Creatures is a simple card game, driven by your imagination and single sheet of paper. This Zine will guide you and your friends on quests with unique creatures that you can create yourself!

Print the zine on a single sheet of paper. All you need is some dice, a deck of cards and a pen! Have fun!

REQUIRED MATERIALS
1) Pen and Paper
2) Dice: D20, D12, D6 and D4
 3) 52 card deck with the Jokers removed.
